title: Teacher
body:
I am sorry, but the school is close today,
the whole staff is severly ill.
I'm myself not feeling well and will go back inside
as soon as I am sure I do not have to send any students home.
-> I have a letter for you <<if $post && !visited("Teacher.Post")>>
    [[Teacher.Post]]

title: Teacher.Post
body:
Thank you!
It is a journal with new teaching methods.
I am already exited to use some of them once everyone is healthy again.
